uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.io
Class Files

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.io.Files

public final class Files
extends Object

Static utility class for file manipulation.

Author:
Simon Wibberley <simon.wibberley@sussex.ac.uk>, Hamish Morgan <hamish.morgan@sussex.ac.uk>
